definitions.definition: A person who edits or makes changes to documents.
A person who edited a specific document.
definitions.example: John Johnson wrote this term paper and the editor was Joan Johnson.

definitions.definition: A person at a newspaper, publisher or similar institution who edits stories and/or decides which ones to publish.
definitions.example: John is the city editor at the Daily Times.

definitions.definition: A machine used for editing (cutting and splicing) movie film
(computer software) A program for creating and making changes to files, especially text files.
definitions.example: The TPU EVE editor is an excellent, extensible, programmable editor.

definitions.definition: Someone who manipulates video footage and assembles it into the correct order etc for broadcast; a picture editor.
